deposits.title: Contributions and Deposits
deposits.detail: You can receive up to an additional 340 CZK per month from the state on top of your contribution. You can also set up employer contributions here.

contribution.title: State contribution
contribution.description: To receive the minimum state contribution, deposit at least 500 CZK per month. For the maximum contribution, deposit 1 700 CZK or more.
contribution.message: To receive the appropriate state contribution, you need to adjust the deposit amount in the Agreement

questionnaireIntro.title:
Investment questionnaire.
Will you save boldly or cautiously?
questionnaireIntro.detail: Answer the following questions to determine your investment profile and find the best strategy for your savings.

questionnaire.title: First steps to finding the best pension savings plan for you
questionnaire.detail: Please take a moment to complete this questionnaire—it helps us understand your financial expectations, knowledge, and experience. With this information, we can recommend the best Supplementary Pension Savings strategy for you. It only takes a few minutes.

skip.title: Do you really wish to skip the questionnaire?
skip.subtitle: If you don’t complete the questionnaire, we won’t be able to assess which investment strategy suits you best, and you will automatically be assigned the Conservative Strategy.
skip.checkbox: I choose not to complete the questionnaire and acknowledge that I may be assigned an unsuitable pension savings strategy.

questionnaire.notFilled: Some questions were not filled correctly

amlSection.title: Information required by law
amlSection.detail: This information is required under Act No. 253/2008 Coll., on Anti-Money Laundering
amlSection.assetsDescription: Or, if applicable, source of debt
amlSection.assetsOther: Enter your other source of personal assets or debt
amlSection.assetsSelectorTitle: Enter your other source of personal assets or debt
amlSection.taxResidence: CR is my only tax residence
amlSection.pep: I am not a politically exposed person
amlSection.pepInfo: A politically exposed person is an individual who holds a prominent public position or role in a government body or international organization, either in the Czech Republic or abroad (e.g., Prime Minister, Member of Parliament, prominent head of local government, judge of the Supreme or Constitutional Court, member of the Central Bank's bank board, senior officer of the armed forces). A politically exposed person is also any: 1) member of immediate family of said person (e.g., parent, child, sibling, spouse), 2) Partner or the beneficial owner of the same legal person or trust fund as said person or a person who has any other close business relationship with said person, 3) Beneficiary owner of a legal person or a trust fund created on behalf or for the benefit of said person.
amlSection.greenCard: I am not a Green Card holder, and my investment advisor or representative is not a U.S. national.

sourceOfIncome.value: Příjem od rodinných příslušníků / Výhra / Dary

strategyInfo.title: Strategy
strategyInfo.detail: The change will take effect no later than the next business day. If existing deposits need to be transferred to new funds, it will take an additional 3 business days.

conservative.title: Your investment profile is Cautious, and the recommended strategy is Conservative
conservative.name: Conservative
conservative.detail: Do you prefer stability over high returns and want to minimize risk? With this profile, investments are expected to have very mild fluctuations, offering returns slightly higher than deposit products. This profile includes conservative investment instruments such as money market funds, government bonds, and mixed funds with a maximum of 25% risk exposure.

documents.title: Statuty účastnických fondů doplňkového penzijního spoření
Klíčové informace k účastnickým fondům doplňkového penzijního spoření

balanced.title: Your investment profile is Balanced, and the recommended strategy is Balanced
balanced.name: Balanced
balanced.detail: Are you comfortable with a moderate level of investment risk and aware of the uncertainty of future returns? If you prefer mid-level returns, a balanced profile might be the right choice. This profile includes a well-balanced mix of investment instruments, such as balanced mixed funds (with a maximum of 65% in riskier assets) and bond funds.

documents.title: Statuty účastnických fondů doplňkového penzijního spoření
Klíčové informace k účastnickým fondům doplňkového penzijního spoření

dynamic.title: Your investment profile is Bold, and the recommended strategy is Dynamic
dynamic.name: Dynamic
dynamic.detail: Are you aiming for high returns and fully aware of the high risk involved? If you see market downturns as an opportunity to invest more or expand your existing investments, a bold profile might be the right choice for you. This profile includes a well-balanced selection of dynamic investment instruments, such as dynamic mixed funds, bond funds, high-yield bonds, and equity funds.

documents.title: Statuty účastnických fondů doplňkového penzijního spoření
Klíčové informace k účastnickým fondům doplňkového penzijního spoření

custom.title: You have selected a Custom profile. The recommended strategy is Conservative
custom.name: Custom
custom.detail: Since the investment questionnaire has not been completed, we recommend allocating 100% of your contributions to the conservative fund. However, you also have the option to choose your own strategy.

documents.title: Statuty účastnických fondů doplňkového penzijního spoření

strategy.disclaimer: I understand that the strategy I’ve chosen differs from the recommended one based on the investment questionnaire.
strategy.disclaimerValidation: Confirm the acknowledgment in order to continue.

fundsInfo.title: Fund information
fundsInfo.detail:
Povinný konzervativní fond NN Penzijní společnosti, a. s.
Konzervativní fond pro ty, kteří chtějí bezpečně uložit peníze i za cenu nízkého výnosu.
Investované peníze jsou uloženy na běžných účtech bank, termínovaných vkladech a ve státních dluhopisech.

Vyvážený účastnický fond NN Penzijní společnosti, a. s.
Vyvážený fond zaměřený na dlouhodobý růst akciových trhů a snížení rizika investicemi do dluhopisů.

Investice je rozdělena v poměru 60:40 na dluhopisy a akci.

Růstový účastnický fond NN Penzijní společnosti, a. s.
Růstový fond pro dlouhodobé investice s důrazem na maximální zhodnocení i přes možné kolísání trhů.

Investice je téměř 100% zaměřena na akcie a podobné instrumenty.

help.title: Help
help.detail: With a state contribution of up to CZK 2,760 per year, saving for retirement is easier. You can also take advantage of a tax credit of up to CZK 3,600 per year.

iconBullets.text: Up to 6,360 CZK a year in state contribution and tax credit
